text: Tony Stewart's Sprint Car Racing is a racing video game developed and published by Monster Games in collaboration with sprint car and NASCAR team- owner Tony Stewart. It was released for the PlayStation 4 and Xbox One on February 14, 2020 and on Microsoft Windows on February 21, 2020. == Gameplay == Tony Stewart's Sprint Car Racing is a sprint car simulation where players can race three different types of sprint cars through 24 fantasy tracks. In career mode, players start in the All-Star TQ Midgets and have to race their way up to the 410 Winged Sprint Cars in the All Star Circuit of Champions. There is also a 24-player online mode and an offline split-screen mode for multiplayer. == Reviews == Game Informer and TheXboxHub gave the game a 70% score.
